title: Neuroprotective Effect of Fresh Gac Fruit Parts Against Î²-Amyloid-Induced Toxicity and Its Influence on Synaptic Gene Expression in HT-22 Cell Model.
abstract: Neurodegenerative diseases (NDs) have emerged as a significant global health crisis, disproportionately affecting the aging population. As longevity increases, the incidence, healthcare costs, and caregiver burden associated with NDs are escalating at an alarming rate. As of recent data, NDs such as Alzheimer's disease (AD) are not only significant health burdens but also reflect a complex interplay between socio-economic factors and healthcare systems worldwide.
